name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-cascadingdropdowns
title: Cascading Dropdowns
shortDescription: Shows how to use Cascading Dropdowns in property panes.
longDescription: Shows how to use Cascading Dropdowns in property panes.

references.name: Use cascading dropdowns in web part properties
references.description: When designing the property pane for your SharePoint client-side web parts, you may have one web part property that displays its options based on the value selected in another property.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
